homeHeader.title: Experience Seamless Offshore Company Formation in Dubai with One Nexuz—Eliminate Risks, Protect Assets, & Stay 100% Compliant
homeHeader.description: Frustrated with lengthy relocation procedures that delay your business launch? Enjoy Dubai’s world-class infrastructure and strategic location to unlock boundless business opportunities from the comfort of your home. Establish your company in the city and get full ownership without relocating to the UAE. Get expert consultation to set up and launch your business in days, not weeks.

leftSection_1.title: Benefits of Setting Up an Offshore Company in Dubai?
leftSection_1.description: Make the most of Dubai’s flourishing business climate, robust regulatory framework, and tax-efficient structure, all without the need for a physical presence in the region. Get unmatched flexibility and global credibility with One Nexuz.

items.title: From Confidential Ownership to Worldwide Asset Protection — Safeguard What Matters Most

items.subTitle: Run Your Business Anywhere, Manage Operations Remotely, & Grow Beyond Boundaries
items.description: Expanding internationally often comes with high costs and operational hurdles. Scale your business across the globe with minimal local operations, all the while streamlining finances with multi-currency accounts. Stay agile, reduce overheads, and keep your business ready for global opportunities.

items.title: Position Your Business in a World-Class Economic Hub to Expand Faster, Trade Smarter, and Grow Globally
items.subTitle: Position Your Business in a World-Class Economic Hub to Expand Faster, Trade Smarter, and Grow Globally
items.description: Complex logistics and costly distribution often slow down global expansion. Located in the heart of major global trade routes, Dubai offshore empowers businesses with seamless logistics and distribution channels. items.title: Streamline Operations, Minimise Waste, and Grow Your Bottom Line with Confidence
items.subTitle: Streamline Operations, Minimise Waste, and Grow Your Bottom Line with Confidence
items.description: Heavy taxes can drain your profits and slow down business growth. Reinvest and double your income with Dubai offshore’s 0% corporate and personal income tax and 100% return on profits. Build long-term wealth and expand your business without financial roadblocks.

sec1.description: Set up your offshore company and capitalize on fast-growing markets across the Middle East, Africa, Asia, and Europe. With One Nexuz, you can get set up in as little as 3-5 days and start scaling from day one!

sec2.title: Get Premium Offshore Company Formation Services Without the Premium Price Tag
sec2.description: At One Nexuz, we believe business setup should be simple, transparent, and cost-effective. That’s why we don’t lock you into rigid packages with unnecessary add-ons. Instead, we offer custom quotes designed around your exact requirements—so you only pay for the services you truly need.

leftSection_5.title: How We Streamline Dubai Offshore Company Setup in 6 Simple Steps

items.title: Book a Free Consultation
items.description: We'll kickstart with a no-obligations call to discuss your business goals, whether investment, asset protection, or holding, and match you with the ideal jurisdiction and ownership structure.

items.title: Connect with a Registered Agent
items.description: Based on your needs, we'll connect you with a local registered agent in Dubai Offshore, who will become your dedicated point of contact in Dubai, streamlining business setup and ensuring compliance.

items.title: Prepare and Submit the Necessary Documents
items.description: Next, our reliable registered agents will help you draft, attest, and notarise the necessary documents, including the MoA, AoA, passport copies, and business plan (if necessary), and submit them on your behalf.

items.title: Collect Your Company Incorporation Certification
items.description: Once your application is approved, the government issues your official company documents, including a Certificate of Incorporation, Share Certificates, and Board Resolution, empowering you to start operating.

items.title: Open Your Offshore Bank Account
items.description: With your incorporation documents in hand, our experts guide you through the banking process, expediting approvals for high-risk structures and allowing you to hold, send, and transact in 20+ currencies worldwide.

items.title: Get Ongoing Support
items.description: Beyond offshore company setup, our reliable local registered agents help you stay compliant with Dubai Offshore's fast-changing requirements through annual renewals, potential share transfers, accounting records, and PRO services.

leftSection_6.title: Why Choose One Nexuz to Set Up in Dubai Offshore
leftSection_6.description: Setting up offshore alone can mean delays, rejections, or legal gaps. At One Nexuz, our proficient business consultants help you build secure, compliant offshore foundations that last.

leftSection_7.description: With top-tier legal protection, zero tax liability, and no physical presence required, Dubai offshore is the perfect zone for billionaires and international firms. Trust our experts to streamline the setup so you can focus on protecting global assets.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: How long does it take to set up a Dubai offshore company?
items.answer: It generally takes 1-14 days to form your company, depending on your unique location, business activities, and document readiness.

items.question: Can I use my offshore company to own or invest in property or shares?
items.answer: Yes, Dubai offshore companies can hold or invest in properties and shares within the region.

items.question: Can I conduct business within the UAE with an offshore company?
items.answer: Unfortunately, Dubai offshore companies cannot conduct business directly within the UAE mainland.

items.question: Do I need to own a physical office space to set up an offshore company in Dubai?
items.answer: No, owning a physical office space is not necessary for a Dubai offshore company. Our experts help you explore cost-effective alternatives per your requirements.

items.question: Do I need to visit Dubai to register my offshore company?
items.answer: No! Most offshore setups can be completed and registered 100% remotely.
